title: October 2023 Community Contests and Events
content: Take a look at the new and upcoming Community Contests below, and be prepared to test your imagination!

title: Issue with Pumpkin Pets in Reboot Worlds
content: We will be removing the pet buffs from the Pumpkin pets that were rewarded in the Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry for Reboot worlds.

title: Cash Shop Update for October 18
content: Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry, Meow Candy Packages, One-Eyed Grim Reaper Package, Halloween Permanent Effects, and more!

title: World's Best Punch King Winners
content: Check out the winners of the Worldâ€™s Best Punch King event and pick up your rewards!

title: Halloween Events
content: It's time for some spooky events to decorate both your home and your characters!

title: Scheduled NA Maintenance - October 19, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled maintenance for NA Worlds on Thursday, October 19, 2023 at 5:00 AM PDT (8:00 AM EDT / 2:00 PM CEST / 11:00 PM AEDT).
